00069           private function init(){
00070                     
00071                     if(zimbraConfig::_ssh_server=='' || zimbraConfig::_ssh_port=='' ||zimbraConfig::_ssh_user=='' ||zimbraConfig::_ssh_pass=='' ||zimbraConfig::_ssh_domain=='' || zimbraConfig::_shellZimbraUser==''){
00072                               return array(zerror::err('False Configuration',null,zerror::critical),null);
00073                     }
00074           
00075                     $this->sysuser=zimbraConfig::_ssh_user.'@'.zimbraConfig::_ssh_domain.':';
00076                     $this->vuser=zimbraConfig::_shellZimbraUser.'@'.zimbraConfig::_ssh_domain.':';
00077                     
00078                     // do connect...
00079                     if(!($con=ssh2_connect(zimbraConfig::_ssh_server,zimbraConfig::_ssh_port))){
00080                               return array(zerror::err('fail: unable to establish connection',null,zerror::critical),null);
00081                               
00082                     }else{
00083                               if(!ssh2_auth_password($con,zimbraConfig::_ssh_user,zimbraConfig::_ssh_pass)) {
00084                                         return array(zerror::err('fail: unable to authenticate',null,zerror::critical),null);
00085                                         
00086                               }else{
00087                                         $this->cmdlog.="connection established\n";
00088                                         
00089                                         if(!($this->shell=ssh2_shell($con,'ssh',null,100,100,SSH2_TERM_UNIT_CHARS))){
00090                                                   return array(zerror::err('fail: unable to establish shell',null,zerror::critical),null);
00091                                         
00092                                         }else{
00093                                                   $this->cmdlog.="shell established\n\n";
00094                                         }
00095                               }
00096                     }
00097 
00098                     
00099                     // CMD LOG disable
00100                     //$this->docmdlog(false);
00101                               
00102                     // read welcome message                                     
00103                     list($err,$ret)=$this->doread($this->sysuser);
00104                     if($err){
00105                               return array($err,null);
00106                     }
00107                     // CMD LOG enable
00108                     $this->docmdlog(true);
00109                     
00110                     // welcome message  
00111                     #echo "-".$ret."-\n";
00112                     
00113                     
00114                     // change user to zimbrauser
00115                     $this->activeuser=$this->vuser;
00116                               
00117                     list($err,$ret)=$this->dowrite('sudo su '.zimbraConfig::_shellZimbraUser);
00118                     
00119                     if($err || strpos($ret,'~~~')!==false){
00120                               return array(zerror::err($err.$ret,null,zerror::critical),null);
00121                     }
00122           
00123                     // blank return => all okay.  
00124                     return array(null,true);
00125           }

00133           public function __destruct(){
00134                     try{
00135                               fclose($this->shell);
00136                               zlog::shelllog($this->errlog,$this->cmdlog);
00137                     }catch(Exception $e){
00138                     }

00148           private function do_cmd($cmd){
00149                     list($err,$output)=$this->dowrite($cmd);
00150                     if($err){
00151                               return array($err,null);
00152                     }
00153                     
00154                     // Wenn Fehler aufgetreten
00155                     if(strpos($output,'ERROR')!==false){
00156                               $this->errlog($cmd."\n".$ret);
00157                     }
00158                     return array(null,$output);
00159           }

00168           private function dowrite($cmd){
00169 
00170                     try{
00171                               fwrite($this->shell,$cmd."\n");
00172                     }catch(Exception $e){
00173                               return array(zerror::err('fail: unable to write command',$e,zerror::critical),null);
00174                     }
00175                     list($err,$output)=$this->doread($this->activeuser,$cmd);
00176                     
00177                     //echo "\n\n<pre>KK--$output--$cmd--".$this->activeuser.'/$--KK</pre>'."\n\n";
00178 
00179                     // Remove command, next commandline and trim the result..
00180                     $t2=str_replace(trim($cmd),'',trim($output));
00181                     $t2=str_replace($this->activeuser.'/$','',$t2);
00182                     $t2=str_replace($this->activeuser.'/root$','',$t2);
00183                     $t2=trim($t2);
00184                     
00185                     //echo "\n\n<pre>return--$t2--</pre>\n\n";
00186                     
00187                     return array(null,$t2);
00188           }

00199           private function doread($endstr='',$cmd=''){
00200                     $ts=time();
00201                     $mtime=10;
00202                     $t='';$t1='';
00203                               
00204                     if($endstr==''){
00205                               return array(zerror::err('fail: Enddelimiter failed',null,zerror::critical),null);
00206                     }else{
00207                               do{
00208                                         sleep(0.2);
00209                                         try{
00210                                                   $t1=fread($this->shell,40);
00211                                         }catch(Exception $e){
00212                                                   return array(zerror::err('fail: unable to read shell output',$e,zerror::critical),null);
00213                                         }
00214                                         // it may wants a password up and there...
00215                                         if(strpos($t1,'[sudo] password for')!==false){
00216                                                   try{
00217                                                             fwrite($this->shell,zimbraConfig::_ssh_pass."\n");
00218                                                             $t1.=" Have written sys-password!\n";
00219                                                   }catch(Exception $e){
00220                                                             return array(zerror::err('fail: unable to write password)',$e,zerror::critical),null);
00221                                                   }
00222                                         }
00223                                         
00224                                         $t.=$t1;
00225                               }while(strpos($t,$endstr)===false && (time()-$ts)<$mtime);
00226                               
00227                               //Clean wenn Command was over 50characters...
00228                               //if(strrpos($t,'')!==false){
00229                               if(strrpos($t,chr(0x08))!==false){
00230                                         $t=$this->over50normalize($t);
00231                               }
00232                     }         
00233                     
00234                     if((time()-$ts)>=$mtime){
00235                               $t.="\nTimeout Error maxtime: ".$mtime."s\n";
00236                               zlog::errlog(zerror::err("\nTimeout Error maxtime: ".$mtime."s\n",null,zerror::notcritical),$t);
00237                     }
00238                     if($this->docmdlog){
00239                               $this->cmdlog.=$t;
00240                     }else{
00241                               $this->cmdlog.=$cmd."\nZimbraSSH: Return Log momentary for this command disabled\n".strrchr($t,$endstr);
00242                               $this->cmdlog2=$t;
00243                     }
00244                     return array(null,$t);                  
00245           }
00246           
00254           private function over50normalize($str){
00255                     $c='';
00256                     $zeilen=explode(chr(0x0D),$str);
00257                     foreach($zeilen as $z){
00258                               $z=str_replace(chr(0x0D),'',$z);
00259                               $t1=strrpos($z,chr(0x08));
00260                               if($t1===false){
00261                                         $c.=$z;
00262                               }else{
00263                                         //Pos von drei leerzeichen - 1 zeichen (das davor wird gebraucht!)
00264                                         //Letztes Backspace Zeichen (davor) + das Backspacezeichen, (das danach wird gebraucht!)
00265                                         $c.=substr($z,strpos($z,'   ')-1,1).substr($z,$t1+1,strlen($z)-($t1+1));
00266                               }
00267                     
00268                     }
00269                     return $c;
00270           }
00271           
00278           public function getcmdlog(){
00279                     return $this->cmdlog;

00289           private function docmdlog($doit){
